page.title: 03Survey of Cheshunt.
page.content: Area of Birth. The majority of parents were born in London,a few locally,over 50 miles away,Italy and Cyprus. Housing. The majority of families live in owner occupied semidetatched and terraced houses with gardens having been built within the past 30 years. 60% had been in their present house less than 10 years.32% less than 5 years. Work. Male sample pattern of employment self employed 20%.Office workers 25%, Building and Allied trades 10%, Communication 10%, Light Engineering 12%. 30% travelled more than 15 miles a day to work,most drove,a few travelled by train or bus. Female sample:Over 70% of mothers worked,mostly part time.Retailing 20% Office workers 25%,Manufacturing 5%.
